Token.Abstract: MaaSCore implements core functionality used in all MaaS modules. All MaaS modules have a MaaSCore dependency.
Initializes MaaSCore and all associated MaaS modules. This method should be called inside application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions: before you do anything else.

Parameter.Name: applicationID
Parameter.Abstract: You can find your application ID in MaaS Portal.

Parameter.Name: accessKey
Parameter.Abstract: A unique key that identifies the client making the request. You can find your access key in MaaS Portal.

Parameter.Name: signatureKey
Parameter.Abstract: A unique key that is used to sign requests. The signature is used to both check request authorization, as well as data integrity. You can find your signature key in MaaS Portal.

Parameter.Name: encryptionKey
Parameter.Abstract: The key used to encrypt and decrypt data that is exchanged between the client and the server. You can find your encryption key in MaaS Portal.

Token.Abstract: Set the console logging level for the specified MaaS module. By default the logging level for all modules is MaaSLogLevel_None.

Parameter.Name: serviceName
Parameter.Abstract: The service name. Every MaaS module has a static serviceName method.
